data.instruction: Upload snapshots for critical steps and submit final markdown report summarizing pass/fail and discovered gaps.
data.expectedResult: Run has persisted report + snapshots in project directory and indexed metadata in DB.

data.instruction: Customer two attempts booking overlapping demand for the same offer/resource window.
data.expectedResult: System either books correctly under capacity rules or rejects with deterministic conflict response.

data.instruction: Invite a biz member, assign an operational role, and verify that member can authenticate into the same biz.
data.expectedResult: Biz member account/session exists with scoped role permissions.

data.instruction: Simulate this persona scenario and validate outcome deterministically: "Kill switch for rogue agent behavior". Capture traces and snapshots so coverage can be audited later.
data.expectedResult: Scenario behavior is either confirmed as supported or produces a clear, actionable failure report.
